item.title: Analyst Dan Ives says it will be the summer of $4 trillion market caps for surging tech giants
item.description: Nvidia and Microsoft are "the poster childs for the AI Revolution," Ives said.

item.title: Microsoft breaks out to new highs. What the charts say to do from here
item.description: When the market rallies, leadership often comes from megacap stocks like Microsoft, and this has certainly been the case since the April low was estab...

item.title: Coinbase is the best-performing stock in the S&P 500 in June, and may have even more room to run
item.description: Coinbase is on pace for its third straight monthly gain, the first time it's put together a three-month rally since the end of 2023.

item.title: Using options to trade this beaten-down beer giant that Warren Buffett holds
item.description: Options trader Michael Khouw breaks down how to trade this beer giant using options.

item.title: Wall Street strategist Tom Lee is aiming to create the MicroStrategy of Ethereum
item.description: Tom Lee of Fundstrat was appointed Chairman of the Board of Directors of BitMine Immersion Technologies, effective Monday.
